metadata.name: Bleeding Lotus
metadata.description: When still waters run deep the lotus flower still will produce one of the most beautiful flower. This 1/1 hand painted then converted to a digital image is a flower that represents a symbol of Life, purity, enlightenment, self-regeneration and rebirth. The bleeding represents the pains we experience in life The distortion represents the obstacles and our unexpected experiences. The beauty of the lotus represent life as whole because life is so beautiful, one most cherish it.
